page.title: 11Northill V. A. Lower School
page.content: Northill Voluntary Aided School serves the villages of{Northill & Ickwell}and is situated in Bedford Road. There are two large classrooms, hall, cloakrooms & kitchen, with two playgrounds, a big playing field & learner swimming pool. The school takes{boys and girls aged 5 {to 9}of all abilities. The current roll of{30 children}(plus 3 four year- olds who are attending for one after- noon per week) are taught by the Head- Teacher and Assistant Teacher. There are two Non-Teaching Assistants, one Caretaker, and a Kitchen Manager who cooks dinners on the premises. The timetable includes basic subjects, plus the sciences, arts and crafts, music and drama, religious education, computer studies, cooking, physical education and thematic studies. Most pupils transfer at 9+ years to Edward Peake Middle School,Biggleswade
